description: Returns information about the capacity reservation with the specified name.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the capacity reservation.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the capacity reservation.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the capacity reservation.

nested_items.name: TargetDpus
nested_items.description: The number of data processing units requested.

nested_items.name: AllocatedDpus
nested_items.description: The number of data processing units currently allocated.

nested_items.name: LastAllocation
nested_items.description: Contains the submission time of a single allocation request for a capacity reservation and the most recent status of the attempted allocation.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the capacity allocation.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: The status message of the capacity allocation.

nested_items.name: RequestTime
nested_items.description: The time when the capacity allocation was requested.

nested_items.name: RequestCompletionTime
nested_items.description: The time when the capacity allocation request was completed.

nested_items.name: LastSuccessfulAllocationTime
nested_items.description: The time of the most recent capacity allocation that succeeded.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time in UTC epoch millis when the capacity reservation was created.
